		}
		return nil
	})
}

## Import



cbs snapshot_share_permission can be imported using the id, e.g.

```sh
$ pulumi import tencentcloud:Cbs/snapshotSharePermission:SnapshotSharePermission snapshot_share_permission snap-xxxxxx
```
